response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000.

We understand that the true value of the product may be subjective and varies based on individual needs and preferences. Our aim is to ensure that you have the chance to experience its benefits firsthand before making a decision. If you choose to accept this offer, we will provide you with comprehensive support and guidance to help you make the most out of this investment.

Should you require any further information or wish to discuss the product in detail, please do not hesitate to reach out. We are here to assist you in any way possible.

Looking forward to the possibility of working together,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
